intro.title: Welcome to $t(title)
intro.name: Intro
intro.content:
I would like to welcome you to this unique interactive portfolio where you will find a list of my projects and past experiences.

My name is Jason Valdron and I've been fascinated by computers for over 17 years. Iâ€™m a bit of a jack of all trades, I know my way around application development, cloud computing, servers, electronics and many other things.

I've focused most of my career building web applications, I know my way around browser quirks, how to build an HTML/CSS integration of an existing design quickly and efficiently, create an efficient and responsive API/backend and how to manage applications on the cloud.

My passion lies in automating tasks all around me. From business needs, to home automation, if there is a way to make a process more efficient, you can bet I'll make it more efficient.

More recently, I've been focusing my career on site reliability engineering principals and practices; mainly around infrastructure, as this is what I truly enjoy.

about-me.name: About Me
about-me.content:
I have had a passion for computer programming since I was 10. At the age of four, I was already sitting at a computer playing around on BSS's and DOS. And by the time I was 10, I had already started doing BASIC coding.

After finding that I had an aptitude for programming. I started to design Web sites and soon realized I had found a niche in the field of software development.

Resourceful and independent, I am full of ideas and I strive to continuously learn and keep up to date with all technologies and standards.

about-portfolio.title: $t(about-portfolio.name) - $t(title)
about-portfolio.name: About Portfolio
about-portfolio.content:
This micro site has been coded and designed from scratch.

All the coding is done by hand using Sublime. The server side coding is done using Node.JS in a MVC structure and the client side coding is done using basic HTML5, CSS3 and AngularJS.

The source code for this micro site is hosted on GitHub and deployed to Heroku. All the frontend assets are hosted on Cloudfront.

Although coding is my primary interest, I fully enjoy the visual aspect of Web development. I have created this design in Illustrator, from scratch, then cut it using Photoshop.

Please note that this micro site has not been IE optimized.
